```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```



```{r}
data(mpg)
```


```{r}
mpg%>%
  plot_ly(
    x = ~hwy,
    y = ~cty,
    #ids = ~car_id,
    color = ~manufacturer,
    frame = ~factor(year),
    size = ~cyl,
    text = ~paste("Class:", class, "\nModel:", model, "\nCylinder:", cyl),
    hoverinfo = "text",
    type = 'scatter',
    mode = 'markers'
    )#%>%
  #layout(title = "drv VS cyl")
```
